titles.title: A bill to amend section 175b of title 18, United States Code, to correct a scrivener's error.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Effective Prosecution of Possession of Biological Toxins and Agents Act of 2018
This bill revises the criminal prohibition on the shipment, transport, possession, or receipt of a biological agent or toxin by a restricted person. Specifically, it updates references to the lists of agents and toxins covered by the prohibition.
